table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `valid` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`module`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vte_tabs
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_tabs` ( `id` int(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `block_id` int(20) NOT NULL, `is_tab` int(1) DEFAULT '0', `parent_tab` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `module_name` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=34 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
